parameters.name: DBInstanceDescription
parameters.description:
The description of the instance.

The description must be 2 to 256 characters in length. It cannot start with http:// or https://.

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the instance.

>  You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) operation to query the instance IDs of all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances in a specific region.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: This parameter is no longer used.
